content.metaTitle: Villa Thalassa Jávea - Luxury 4-Bed Sea View Villa €2.1M
content.metaDescription: Stunning new build Villa Thalassa in exclusive Balcón al Mar, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, panoramic sea views to Ibiza, private pool. Completion Feb 2026. €2,095,000
content.heroIntro:
Perched majestically in the exclusive Balcón al Mar enclave of Jávea, Villa Thalassa represents the pinnacle of Mediterranean luxury living. This exceptional south-facing villa, currently undergoing a complete refurbishment by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, seamlessly blends timeless Mediterranean architecture with contemporary sophistication across its generous 1,000 m² plot.

From the moment you step into the main living area, Villa Thalassa captivates with its expansive glass walls that frame breathtaking sea and valley panoramas, flooding the interiors with natural light and creating an effortless indoor-outdoor flow to the spacious terraces. The crown jewel is undoubtedly the master bedroom suite upstairs, featuring a private terrace with uninterrupted panoramic views stretching across the azure Mediterranean all the way to the magical island of Ibiza.

Scheduled for completion in February 2026, this is more than just a home—it's your gateway to the most coveted coastal lifestyle on the Costa Blanca, where privacy, elegance, and Mediterranean serenity converge in perfect harmony.

locationSection.intro:
Balcón al Mar in Jávea stands as one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious residential areas, renowned for its elevated position offering commanding views over the Mediterranean Sea. This exclusive enclave provides the perfect balance of tranquil privacy and convenient access to Jávea's world-class amenities, making it the preferred choice for discerning international buyers seeking the ultimate in coastal luxury.

Jávea itself is considered the jewel of the Costa Blanca, where the dramatic Montgó Natural Park meets pristine Mediterranean beaches. The town offers three distinct coastal areas—the historic old town, the bustling port area (Duanes de la Mar), and the sandy Arenal beach—each providing unique charm and amenities. With its year-round temperate climate, exceptional gastronomy, and vibrant international community, Jávea has earned its reputation as one of Spain's most desirable places to live.
highlights: Just minutes from Jávea's most beautiful beaches including Granadella and Ambolo coves
Exclusive Balcón al Mar location with premium properties and sea views
15-minute drive to Jávea's international schools and medical facilities
Easy access to championship golf courses at Jávea Golf Club
One hour from Valencia airport with direct flights across Europe

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Thalassa showcases Miralbo Urbana's commitment to exceptional quality, featuring four generously proportioned bedrooms, sophisticated open-plan living spaces, and premium finishes throughout. The thoughtfully designed exteriors include elegant shaded pergolas, a private swimming pool, and meticulously planned Mediterranean landscaping that creates natural privacy while maximizing the spectacular views.

Master bedroom suite with private terrace and panoramic sea views to Ibiza
Open-plan living areas with floor-to-ceiling glass doors to terraces
Premium kitchen with high-end appliances and contemporary design
Private swimming pool with Mediterranean sea views
Elegant pergolas providing shaded outdoor dining and relaxation areas
Professional Mediterranean landscaping on 1,000 m² plot
South-facing orientation ensuring optimal natural light throughout the day
High-end finishes and materials selected by Miralbo Urbana
Multiple outdoor terraces for entertaining and al fresco dining

content.investmentSection:
Jávea's luxury property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth potential, with premium villas in exclusive locations like Balcón al Mar showing consistent appreciation over the past decade. The area's limited supply of sea-view properties, combined with increasing international demand, particularly from UK, German, and Scandinavian buyers, creates a compelling investment scenario. Villa Thalassa's exceptional location and quality construction position it perfectly to capitalize on this trend.

For investors considering rental potential, luxury villas in Jávea with sea views command premium rates, with peak season weekly rentals often exceeding €3,000-4,000 for properties of this caliber. The villa's proximity to beaches, restaurants, and amenities, combined with its stunning views and private pool, make it highly attractive to high-end holiday rental markets. Additionally, Jávea's growing reputation as a year-round destination means extended rental seasons and strong occupancy rates for quality properties.

Panoramic Mediterranean views extending to Ibiza from the master bedroom terrace

Private 1,000 m² plot offering space, privacy and Mediterranean landscaping

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa Thalassa and what payment structure is available?
faqs.answer: Villa Thalassa is priced at €2,095,000. As this is a refurbishment project with completion scheduled for February 2026, flexible payment structures are typically available. We can arrange mortgage financing through our Habeno partnership to help secure competitive rates for international buyers.

faqs.question: Why is the Balcón al Mar location in Jávea considered so desirable?
faqs.answer: Balcón al Mar is one of Jávea's most exclusive residential areas, offering elevated positions with commanding sea views and premium properties. The location provides privacy and tranquility while being just minutes from Jávea's beaches, restaurants, and amenities, making it highly sought after by international buyers.

faqs.question: What does the buying process involve for UK buyers purchasing Villa Thalassa?
faqs.answer: The process involves securing a Spanish NIE number, opening a Spanish bank account, and conducting legal due diligence through a Spanish lawyer. We guide international buyers through each step and can recommend trusted legal professionals familiar with Costa Blanca property transactions.

faqs.question: Can I obtain a Spanish mortgage for Villa Thalassa as a non-resident?
faqs.answer: Yes, non-resident buyers can typically secure Spanish mortgages up to 70% of the property value. We work with Habeno, specialist mortgage brokers who can access competitive rates from multiple Spanish banks and handle the entire mortgage application process for international buyers.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does Villa Thalassa offer?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas with sea views in Jávea can command €3,000-4,000+ per week during peak season. The combination of stunning views, private pool, and premium location makes Villa Thalassa highly attractive for high-end holiday rentals with strong year-round potential.

faqs.question: When will Villa Thalassa be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Villa Thalassa is scheduled for completion in February 2026, delivered fully refurbished and ready to move in. The property will be finished to Miralbo Urbana's exceptional standards with all high-end finishes and landscaping completed.

faqs.question: What is included in the Villa Thalassa purchase price?
faqs.answer: The purchase includes the fully refurbished villa, complete Mediterranean landscaping, private swimming pool, elegant pergolas, premium kitchen appliances, and all high-end finishes. The property will be delivered turnkey ready with no additional work required.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa Thalassa?
faqs.answer: We can arrange site visits to see the current refurbishment progress and surrounding area. Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to schedule a viewing appointment, and we can also provide virtual tours and detailed plans to international buyers.

content.conclusion: Villa Thalassa represents a rare opportunity to secure one of Jávea's most exceptional new properties in the exclusive Balcón al Mar location. With its stunning sea views to Ibiza, premium refurbishment by Miralbo Urbana, and turnkey delivery in February 2026, this villa offers the perfect combination of luxury, location, and investment potential. Don't miss your chance to own this piece of Mediterranean paradise—contact us today via WhatsApp at the link above or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your viewing and secure your Costa Blanca dream home.
